text: اذ قال لابيه وقومه ماذا تعبدون

translations.translation: and said to his father and his people, 'What are you worshipping
When he said to his father and his people: "What is this you worship?
and said to his father and his people: “Whom do you worship?
and asked his father and his people, "What is that you worship?
When he said to his father (paternal uncle) and his people, “What do you worship?”
When he said to his father and to his people: "What is it that which you worship"
When he said to his father and his people: What is it that you worship?
when he said to his father and his folk, 'What do you serve?
When he said unto his father and his folk: What is it that ye worship?
Behold!" he said to his father and to his people, "What are these that you worship?
Recall what time he said Unto his father and his people: What is it that ye worship?
When he said to his father and his people, ‘What is it that you are worshiping?
Behold! he said to his father and to his people, "What is that which ye worship?
When he said to his father and to his people: "What is it that which you worship?
and when he said to his father and to his nation: 'What do you worship?
He said to his father and his people, “What are you worshiping?
[And] when he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?
[37:85] when he said, [while still] in this continuous state of his, to his father and his folk, in reproach: ‘What do — what is it that — you worship?
(When he said unto his father) Azar (and his folk) the idol worshippers: (What is it that you worship) beside Allah?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { إِذْ قَالَ } جدك إبراهيم الخليل، صلوات الرحمن عليه وسلامه { لأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِ } حين انكشف بالتوحيد الإلهي، وتمكن من مرتبة الشهود العيني والحقي، مستفهماً على سبيل الإنكار والتوبيخ؛ غيره على الله وإظهاراً لمقتضى الخلة: { مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ } [الصافات: 85] أي: لأي شيء تعبدون هذه الأصنام الباطلة العاطلة عن لوازم الألوهية والربوبية، أيها الجاهلون بتوحيد الله وبكمال أوصافه وأسمائه
